pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 4, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Gr√©goire Trudeau will participate in the Vancouver Pride Parade.
